sentence.text: The purpose of this study was to explore the use of iterative decomposition of water and positive regulation of cell-matrix adhesion with echo asymmetry and least-squares estimation Carr-Purcell-Meiboom-Gill (IDEAL-CPMG) to simultaneously measure skeletal muscle apparent fat fraction and water T<sub>2</sub> (T<sub>2,w</sub>) in patients with Duchenne muscular dystrophy (DMD).
